trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA064_00476_SEQ_00<tab>Anaoc seeks an adventurer to assist the Red Rooster Stead.
TEXT_SUBSEA064_00476_SEQ_01<tab>Anaoc asks you to deliver wool to the Grey Fleet. Retrieve the sack of fleece from the sheep's pen.
TEXT_SUBSEA064_00476_SEQ_02<tab>You have obtained the sack of fleece. Deliver it to Weitzaren at the Grey Fleet.
TEXT_SUBSEA064_00476_SEQ_03<tab>Weitzaren receives your delivery with equal parts exasperation and delight. Thanks to you, the miller may now begin making his felt.
TEXT_SUBSEA064_00476_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the sack of fleece to Weitzaren at the Grey Fleet.
TEXT_SUBSEA064_00476_ANAOC_000_0<tab>I hope you don't feel sheepish about hauling a wee bit of wool. The flock's fleece is shorn and scoured, and the sack is all set to sail.
TEXT_SUBSEA064_00476_ANAOC_000_1<tab>Normally, the manic miller up north takes it and felts it for us.
TEXT_SUBSEA064_00476_ANAOC_000_2<tab>But it seems the only wool his courier's tending to today is his blanket, the lackadaisical loafer.
TEXT_SUBSEA064_00476_ANAOC_000_3<tab>So, I hoped you might see to it the sack of fleece down by the flock's pen reaches the miller─Weitzaren is his name.
TEXT_SUBSEA064_00476_WEITZAREN_000_10<tab>A miller with no fleece is an artist with no canvas! A poet with no words! A man with no purpose!
TEXT_SUBSEA064_00476_WEITZAREN_000_11<tab>Curse that blasted courier! Do the sheep stop growing? Does the mill stop churning? What entitles him to rest?
TEXT_SUBSEA064_00476_WEITZAREN_000_12<tab>Bah! Let him count sheep in his bed! The wool is at last mine, and soon the felt shall be wrought! Mwahahaha...
